snippet: When he’s not busy keeping tabs on the “crossroads of the world,” Tim Tompkins, president of the Times Square Alliance, fills his Sundays with yoga, Broadway shows and Italian dinners.
abstract: Tim Tompkins, president of the Times Square Alliance, in charge of orchestrating the New Year's Eve ball drop, describes his typical Sunday routine.
lead_paragraph: When he’s not busy keeping tabs on the “crossroads of the world,” Tim Tompkins, president of the Times Square Alliance, fills his Sundays with yoga, Broadway shows and Italian dinners.

headline.print_headline: Keeping an Eye on Times Square
headline.seo: Tim Tompkins, Keeping an Eye on Times Square, Even on Sundays
headline.main: Keeping an Eye on Times Square
